description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. S.D.G.T is a strategic take on the space shooter genre that combines chaotically firing up to seven weapons at once with a myriad of talent tree styled upgrade decisions. Not for the feint hearted!
description.short: S.D.G.T is a strategic take on the space shooter genre that combines chaotically firing up to seven weapons at once with a myriad of talent tree styled upgrade decisions. Not for the feint hearted!
